local_intent: Place phase: re-detect red plate, move above target, lower until contact, verify contact, place onto red_plate_center, release, and retreat.
assumptions: Contact sensor reports contact at or below configured threshold
red_plate_center pose is available for PlaceAt
Workspace free for descent and retreat
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT 'place' phase: perceptual retry for the red plate, pre-placement positioning, executing LowerUntilContact (matching LOCAL_ANNOTATION), confirming contact, performing PlaceAt, opening the gripper, and retreating to clear the placement area.
